res = await contract.connect(signer).owner();
res = await contract.owner();
let res = await contract.owner();
let res = await contract._recId();
await contract._recId();
let signer = (await ethers.getSigner())
const contract = await raw.attach('0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3');
let raw = await ethers.getContractFactory("SampleERC5006");

const contract = await raw.deploy();

exit
signer = (await ethers.getSigner())
contract = await raw.deploy();
